channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: AP Week in Pictures: Global
item.description: Nov. 15-21, 2024A new volcanic eruption started on the Reykjanes Peninsula in Iceland.Indigenous communities attended the COP29 climate summit in Baku, Azerbaijan.

item.title: 6 agencies investigate after a photographer says he found remains in a burned Georgia funeral home
item.description: Half a dozen state and county agencies are investigating a burned Georgia funeral home. A photographer from England said he found urns, bags of human ashes, and even human remains in what is left of the building.

item.title: Georgia disbands current maternal mortality committee over leaked abortion information
item.description: A Georgia official disbanded the stateâ€™s maternal mortality committee that investigates deaths of pregnant women.
